text: Dhuruva Natchathiram () is a 1993 Tamil language drama film directed by L. Raja and produced by A. M. Varadarajan. The film features Arjun and Pallavi in the lead roles.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FBo4oPGW8as The film had a musical score by Ilaiyaraaja and was released on 15 October 1993 after several delays. ==Cast== *Arjun *Pallavi *Jaishankar *Jaiganesh *Goundamani *Senthil *Sumithra *Kovai Sarala *Uma Maheswari *Kumarimuthu *Senthamarai *Typist Gopu ==Production== The film completed production and was censored by August 1990, though financial problems meant that it was only released in October 1993.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x0X1wIQANP4 ==Soundtrack== The film score and the soundtrack were composed by film composer Ilaiyaraaja. The soundtrack, released in 1993, features 6 tracks. {| class="wikitable" style="font- size:95%;" ! Track !! Song !! Singer(s)!!
